onSuccess.displayText: {Player} dropped whatever he was carrying and fights off the ambush, once again saving {Knight1}’s life. However, he was cut by a poisoned knife during the scuffle. This poison was so potent, such that even with his angelic powers, {Player} could not cleanse it from his body. He collapsed soon after, his consciousness fading into nothingness. That last thing that he saw would be {Knight1}’s face, full of sorrow.
